verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 3:1 \ft Or Angel; also in verses 3, 4, 5, and 6; corresponding pronouns may also be capitalized.\f* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \f + \fr 3:1 \ft That is, the Accuser or the Adversary; also in verse 2\f* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w accuse|strong="H7853"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*: “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebukes|strong="H1605"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*! \w Indeed|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w rebukes|strong="H1605"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*! \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* firebrand \f + \fr 3:2 \ft That is, a burning stick\f* \w snatched|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire?”

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dressed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* garments \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* angel \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H5493"\w* \w off|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* \w clothes|strong="H3847"\w*!” \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Joshua, “\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* splendid \w robes|strong="H4254"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, “\w Let|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w turban|strong="H6797"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w turban|strong="H6797"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5749"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H5749"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*:

“\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘If \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w instructions|strong="H1870"\w*, \w then|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w govern|strong="H1777"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* among \w these|strong="H1004"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w here|strong="H3541"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w companions|strong="H7453"\w* \w seated|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w going|strong="H2005"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* bring \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Branch|strong="H6780"\w*.

\w See|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* stone \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*; \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* stone \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 3:9 \ft Or facets\f* \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w engrave|strong="H6605"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inscription|strong="H6603"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remove|strong="H4185"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* sit \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*.’”
